form.title: Send a Message
form.name: Name
form.messagePlaceholder: Briefly describe your project or inquiry...
form.success: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully.
form.error: Failed to send message. Please try again.
form.errorNetwork: Network error: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your internet connection and try again.
form.errorInvalidResponse: Server returned invalid response. Please try again or contact support.
form.errorUnknown: Unknown error occurred. Please try again.
form.errorTooLarge: Message is too large ({size} MB). Maximum allowed size is {max} MB. Please shorten your message.
form.error413: Message is too large. The server rejected your request because it exceeds the maximum allowed size. Please shorten your message to less than 1 MB.
form.error400: Invalid request data. Please check your input.
form.error500: Server error. Please try again later.
form.error503: Service temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
form.errorStatus: Request failed with status {status}. Please try again.
